Name: The Bad, The Worse & Djanky
About the game: A playful yet chaotic top-down shooter, based on the mechanics of 'realistic' weapon reloading and ricochets. Inspired by everyone's favourite spaghetti-westerns. Attempt to shoot your friends, accidentally shoot yourself in this local and controller based video game.
